column2: question
column5: Washing hands regularly for 20 seconds or more
column6: Only going outside your home for essential shopping and exercise
column9: Wearing a face mask/covering where relevant
column10: Only meeting up in small groups of people from outside your household (up to six) in public and staying 2 metres apart
column11: Only meeting up with one other person at a time from outside your household in public and staying 2 metres apart
column12: Only going outside your home for essential shopping, exercise and meeting with one other person outside your household
column13: Stay at home as much as possible
column14: Only meeting outside with up to six people from two households
column15: Only meeting outside with up to four people from two households
column16: Only meeting outside with up to six people from two households_1
column17: Only meeting outside with up to six people from any number of households or any number of people from two households
column18: Only meeting with up to eight people from two households in public, ideally within 5 miles and staying 2 metres apart
column19: Only meeting with any number of people from two households in public, within 5 miles and staying 2 metres apart
column20: Wearing a face mask/covering on public transport or in an enclosed public space where social distancing is not possible
